snippet: Colin Kaepernick, who took over for the veteran Alex Smith in Week 11, led the 49ers past the Packers in an N.F.C. divisional playoff.
lead_paragraph: Colin Kaepernick, who took over for the veteran Alex Smith in Week 11, led the 49ers past the Packers in an N.F.C. divisional playoff.

headline.seo: Kaepernick Backs Harbaugh’s Gamble With Playoff Win
headline.main: Big Payoff in Harbaugh’s Gamble With Kaepernick
headline.print_headline: Big Payoff in Harbaugh’s Gamble With Kaepernick
